SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractEntityBuilder
 
AbstractTreeWriter
AbstractTreeWriter is an abstract class for performing the output operation on the entity tree.
FSTreeWriter performs the output operation into the file system.
ArchiveEntity performs the output operation into the archive file.
AES128CTRStrategy
 
AESEntity
AESEntity is a concrete implementation of ArchiveEntityProcessor, that provides AES encryption and decryption of the data of the underlying entity.
AESEntityBuilder
 
AESStrategy
 
ArchiveCorruptedException
Thrown when the archive file semantics doesn't match that of ArchiveTreeWriter.
ArchiveEntity
ArchiveEntity is an abstract class, which stores information about a file descriptor.
ArchiveEntityBuilder
 
ArchiveEntityBuilderInterface<T>
 
ArchiveEntityDecorator
ArchiveEntityDecorator is an abstract class that stores an ArchiveEntity object, replicates the same interface, and forwards the interface invocations to the component.
ArchiveEntityFactory
 
ArchiveEntityProcessor
ArchiveEntityProcessor is an extension of ArchiveEntityDecorator class, that provides encoding and decoding of data accessed through ArchiveEntityDecorator.getContent(ByteBuffer).
ArchiveEntityProperty
ArchiveEntityProperty is a record to store an entity property.
ArchiveTreeBuilder
ArchiveTreeBuilder is a concrete implementation of TreeBuilder, that constructs an entity tree out of an archive file generated by ArchiveTreeWriter.
ArchiveTreeBuilder.ArchEntityInfo
ArchEntityInfo is tuple consisted of an archive entity header and its offset in the archive file.
ArchiveTreeWriter
ArchiveTreeWriter is a concrete implementation of AbstractTreeWriter, that performs the output operation on the given entity tree into an archive file.
Buffers
 
Channels
Channels is a class containing static methods related to channels.
DefaultFileEntityBuilder
 
DirectoryEntity
DirectoryEntity is a concrete implementation of ArchiveEntity, that supports children related methods.
FileEntity
FileEntity is a concrete implementation of ArchiveEntity that doesn't support children related operations.
FileEntityBuilder
 
FileHierarchy
FileHierarchy is a class to provide instantaneous access to the child entities of the parent entity.
FSTreeBuilder
FSTreeBuilder is a concrete implementation of TreeBuilder, that constructs a new entity tree out of stored files and directories.
FSTreeWriter
FSTreeWriter is a concrete implementation of AbstractTreeWriter that performs the output operation on the given tree into the file system.
Headers
Headers is a class containing static methods related to header processing.
Metadata
Metadata is a class encapsulating the metadata of an archive file.
The metadata structure consists of:
the signature
the number of line of the metadata header
the key-value tuple separated by a space
Example:

ardat
3
that's-it yes
Metadata.MetadataBuilder
MetadataBuilder is a class to create a new instance of Metadata.
PrettyEntity
PrettyEntity is a concrete implementation of ArchiveEntityProcessor, that renders the data of the underlying entity as hexadecimal, meaning that every byte is encoded as 2 characters ranging from 00 to ff.
PrettyEntityBuilder
 
SharedChannelFactory
SharedChannelFactory is a global object intended to initiate and store the instances of SharedSeekableByteChannel.
SharedSeekableByteChannel
SharedSeekableByteChannel is a wrapper class of SeekableByteChannel, which allows it to reference to the same concrete implementation of SeekableByteChannel ( e.g.
TreeBuilder
TreeBuilder is an abstract class intended to create entity trees from different sources.
FSTreeBuilder creates an entity tree using the file or the directory.
ArchiveEntity creates an entity tree using the archive file.
TreeRoot
TreeRoot is a global object to store the tree of the archive entity.

Every ArchiveEntity can have an open channel associated with it, so it's necessary to free the resources.
